<Link id="l00018" /><CodeLine lineNumber="18"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00019" /><CodeLine lineNumber="19"><Highlight kind="comment">/// Atomic pointer that&#39;s lock-free, but that can coordinate concurrent writes</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00020" /><CodeLine lineNumber="20"><Highlight kind="comment">/// from a lazy generator. Should be reserved for cases where concurrent uses of</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00021" /><CodeLine lineNumber="21"><Highlight kind="comment">/// a generator for the same storage is unlikely.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00022" /><CodeLine lineNumber="22"><Highlight kind="comment">///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00023" /><CodeLine lineNumber="23"><Highlight kind="comment">/// The laziness comes in with \\a loadOrGenerate(), which lazily calls the</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00024" /><CodeLine lineNumber="24"><Highlight kind="comment">/// provided generator ONLY when the value is currently \\c nullptr. With</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00025" /><CodeLine lineNumber="25"><Highlight kind="comment">/// concurrent calls, only one generator is called and the rest see that value.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00026" /><CodeLine lineNumber="26"><Highlight kind="comment">///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00027" /><CodeLine lineNumber="27"><Highlight kind="comment">/// Most other APIs treat an in-flight \\a loadOrGenerate() as if \\c nullptr</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00028" /><CodeLine lineNumber="28"><Highlight kind="comment">/// were stored. APIs that are required to write a value will spin.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00029" /><CodeLine lineNumber="29"><Highlight kind="comment">///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00030" /><CodeLine lineNumber="30"><Highlight kind="comment">/// The underlying storage is \\a std::atomic&lt;uintptr&#95;t&gt;.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00031" /><CodeLine lineNumber="31"><Highlight kind="comment">///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00032" /><CodeLine lineNumber="32"><Highlight kind="comment">/// TODO: In C++20, use std::atomic&lt;T&gt;::wait() instead of spinning and call</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00033" /><CodeLine lineNumber="33"><Highlight kind="comment">/// std::atomic&lt;T&gt;::notify&#95;all() in \\a loadOrGenerate().</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00034" /><CodeLine lineNumber="34" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/lazyatomicpointer"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">template</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &lt;</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">class</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> T&gt; </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">class </Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/lazyatomicpointer/#aa697fdaf1fb346ba87e659b5502d95ed">LazyAtomicPointer</a> &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00035" /><CodeLine lineNumber="35"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">static</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">constexpr</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> uintptr&#95;t getNull() &#123; </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> 0; &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00036" /><CodeLine lineNumber="36"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">static</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">constexpr</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> uintptr&#95;t getBusy() &#123; </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> UINTPTR&#95;MAX; &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00037" /><CodeLine lineNumber="37"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00041" /><CodeLine lineNumber="41"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00043" /><CodeLine lineNumber="43"><Highlight kind="normal">    uintptr&#95;t Raw = <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value">Value</a> ? </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">reinterpret&#95;cast&lt;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">uintptr&#95;t</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">&gt;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value">Value</a>) : getNull();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00044" /><CodeLine lineNumber="44"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(Raw != getBusy());</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00045" /><CodeLine lineNumber="45"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> Raw;</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00050" /><CodeLine lineNumber="50" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/lazyatomicpointer/#a06b2044c993588d4b7a03932c695f40d"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">void</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/lazyatomicpointer/#a06b2044c993588d4b7a03932c695f40d">store</a>(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/mips/mips16isellowering-cpp/#a0acb682b8260ab1c60b918599864e2e5">T</a> &#42;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value">Value</a>) &#123; </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (</Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">void</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">)<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/lazyatomicpointer/#abbb2a344166a0994a7e737e409b076d1">exchange</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value">Value</a>); &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00054" /><CodeLine lineNumber="54" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/lazyatomicpointer/#abbb2a344166a0994a7e737e409b076d1"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/mips/mips16isellowering-cpp/#a0acb682b8260ab1c60b918599864e2e5">T</a> &#42;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/lazyatomicpointer/#abbb2a344166a0994a7e737e409b076d1">exchange</a>(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/mips/mips16isellowering-cpp/#a0acb682b8260ab1c60b918599864e2e5">T</a> &#42;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value">Value</a>) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00055" /><CodeLine lineNumber="55"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Note: the call to compare&#95;exchange&#95;weak() fails &quot;spuriously&quot; if the</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00056" /><CodeLine lineNumber="56"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// current value is \\a getBusy(), causing the loop to spin.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00057" /><CodeLine lineNumber="57"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/mips/mips16isellowering-cpp/#a0acb682b8260ab1c60b918599864e2e5">T</a> &#42;Old = </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">nullptr</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00058" /><CodeLine lineNumber="58"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">while</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (!<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/lazyatomicpointer/#aa16e4fb83461cff80958d3d154f7a096">compare&#95;exchange&#95;weak</a>(Old, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value">Value</a>)) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00059" /><CodeLine lineNumber="59"><Highlight kind="normal">    &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00067" /><CodeLine lineNumber="67"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (Storage.compare&#95;exchange&#95;weak(RawExistingValue, makeRaw(NewValue)))</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00068" /><CodeLine lineNumber="68"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">true</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00070" /><CodeLine lineNumber="70"><Highlight kind="comment">    /// Report the existing value as &quot;None&quot; if busy.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00078" /><CodeLine lineNumber="78"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// Compare-exchange. Keeps trying if there is a concurrent</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00080" /><CodeLine lineNumber="80" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/lazyatomicpointer/#a1ef184ef819b5890fc765374952031c0"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">bool</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/lazyatomicpointer/#a1ef184ef819b5890fc765374952031c0">compare&#95;exchange&#95;strong</a>(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/mips/mips16isellowering-cpp/#a0acb682b8260ab1c60b918599864e2e5">T</a> &#42;&amp;ExistingValue, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/mips/mips16isellowering-cpp/#a0acb682b8260ab1c60b918599864e2e5">T</a> &#42;NewValue) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00096" /><CodeLine lineNumber="96"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00097" /><CodeLine lineNumber="97"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00098" /><CodeLine lineNumber="98"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// Return the current stored value. Returns \\a None if there is a concurrent</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00099" /><CodeLine lineNumber="99"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// \\a loadOrGenerate() in flight.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00100" /><CodeLine lineNumber="100" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/lazyatomicpointer/#a2765bbb67bf6ef080ea479268430623d"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/mips/mips16isellowering-cpp/#a0acb682b8260ab1c60b918599864e2e5">T</a> &#42;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/lazyatomicpointer/#a2765bbb67bf6ef080ea479268430623d">load</a>()</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword"> const </Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">&#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00101" /><CodeLine lineNumber="101"><Highlight kind="normal">    uintptr&#95;t RawValue = Storage.load();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00102" /><CodeLine lineNumber="102"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> RawValue == getBusy() ? nullptr : makePointer(RawValue);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00103" /><CodeLine lineNumber="103"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00104" /><CodeLine lineNumber="104"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00105" /><CodeLine lineNumber="105"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// Get the current value, or call \\p Generator to generate a value.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00106" /><CodeLine lineNumber="106"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// Guarantees that only one thread&#39;s \\p Generator will run.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00107" /><CodeLine lineNumber="107"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00108" /><CodeLine lineNumber="108"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// \\pre \\p Generator doesn&#39;t return \\c nullptr.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00109" /><CodeLine lineNumber="109" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/lazyatomicpointer/#aa2b1f76810fa4eb122a4057c975c9396"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/mips/mips16isellowering-cpp/#a0acb682b8260ab1c60b918599864e2e5">T</a> &amp;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/lazyatomicpointer/#aa2b1f76810fa4eb122a4057c975c9396">loadOrGenerate</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/function-ref">function&#95;ref</a>&lt;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/mips/mips16isellowering-cpp/#a0acb682b8260ab1c60b918599864e2e5">T</a> &#42;()&gt; Generator) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00110" /><CodeLine lineNumber="110"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Return existing value, if already set.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00111" /><CodeLine lineNumber="111"><Highlight kind="normal">    uintptr&#95;t Raw = Storage.load();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00112" /><CodeLine lineNumber="112"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (Raw != getNull() &amp;&amp; Raw != getBusy())</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00113" /><CodeLine lineNumber="113"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &#42;makePointer(Raw);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00114" /><CodeLine lineNumber="114"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00115" /><CodeLine lineNumber="115"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Try to mark as busy, then generate and store a new value.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00116" /><CodeLine lineNumber="116"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (<a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/compiler-h/#ae5b35beb6f127e5f47269e9124b886fb">LLVM&#95;LIKELY</a>(Raw == getNull() &amp;&amp;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00117" /><CodeLine lineNumber="117"><Highlight kind="normal">                    Storage.compare&#95;exchange&#95;strong(Raw, getBusy()))) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00118" /><CodeLine lineNumber="118"><Highlight kind="normal">      Raw = makeRaw(Generator());</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00119" /><CodeLine lineNumber="119"><Highlight kind="normal">      <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(Raw != getNull() &amp;&amp; </Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot;Expected non-null from generator&quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00120" /><CodeLine lineNumber="120"><Highlight kind="normal">      Storage.store(Raw);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00121" /><CodeLine lineNumber="121"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &#42;makePointer(Raw);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00122" /><CodeLine lineNumber="122"><Highlight kind="normal">    &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00123" /><CodeLine lineNumber="123"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00124" /><CodeLine lineNumber="124"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Contended with another generator. Wait for it to complete.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00125" /><CodeLine lineNumber="125"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">while</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (Raw == getBusy())</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00126" /><CodeLine lineNumber="126"><Highlight kind="normal">      Raw = Storage.load();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00127" /><CodeLine lineNumber="127"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(Raw != getNull() &amp;&amp; </Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot;Expected non-null from competing generator&quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00128" /><CodeLine lineNumber="128"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &#42;makePointer(Raw);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00129" /><CodeLine lineNumber="129"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00130" /><CodeLine lineNumber="130"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00131" /><CodeLine lineNumber="131" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/lazyatomicpointer/#a6c95319b9ef803355015d561991ba91b"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">explicit</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">operator</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> bool()</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword"> const </Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">&#123; </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/lazyatomicpointer/#a2765bbb67bf6ef080ea479268430623d">load</a>(); &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00132" /><CodeLine lineNumber="132" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/lazyatomicpointer/#a93ce341f2c76dc894bd07c629458e16e"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">operator</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/mips/mips16isellowering-cpp/#a0acb682b8260ab1c60b918599864e2e5">T</a> &#42;() </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &#123; </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/lazyatomicpointer/#a2765bbb67bf6ef080ea479268430623d">load</a>(); &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00133" /><CodeLine lineNumber="133"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00134" /><CodeLine lineNumber="134" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/lazyatomicpointer/#a4504a055b55e9ce49b4c092b81594489"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/mips/mips16isellowering-cpp/#a0acb682b8260ab1c60b918599864e2e5">T</a> &amp;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/lazyatomicpointer/#a4504a055b55e9ce49b4c092b81594489">operator&#42;</a>()</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword"> const </Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">&#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00135" /><CodeLine lineNumber="135"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/mips/mips16isellowering-cpp/#a0acb682b8260ab1c60b918599864e2e5">T</a> &#42;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/option/option-cpp/#a04665169063c8ca1f2ea96c27fc7c2b2">P</a> = <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/lazyatomicpointer/#a2765bbb67bf6ef080ea479268430623d">load</a>();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00136" /><CodeLine lineNumber="136"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/option/option-cpp/#a04665169063c8ca1f2ea96c27fc7c2b2">P</a> &amp;&amp; </Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot;Unexpected null dereference&quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00137" /><CodeLine lineNumber="137"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &#42;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/option/option-cpp/#a04665169063c8ca1f2ea96c27fc7c2b2">P</a>;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00138" /><CodeLine lineNumber="138"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00139" /><CodeLine lineNumber="139" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/lazyatomicpointer/#a27a2682732bf6259ee142cfa790bda3c"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/mips/mips16isellowering-cpp/#a0acb682b8260ab1c60b918599864e2e5">T</a> &#42;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/lazyatomicpointer/#a27a2682732bf6259ee142cfa790bda3c">operator-&gt;</a>()</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword"> const </Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">&#123; </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &amp;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/lazyatomicpointer/#a4504a055b55e9ce49b4c092b81594489">operator&#42;</a>(); &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
